sentences: Voit lisätä suolaa ruokaan maun mukaan.
context: The Finnish verb 'lisätä' means 'to add'. It is a transitive verb, meaning it requires an object. The word can also mean to increase something.  It conjugates based on person and tense as shown in the dictionary definition. Note that it is not used for arithmetic sums; 'laskea yhteen' is used for that purpose instead.
